short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create short links, QRCodes, with your own domain. Share them anywhere. Track what’s working, and what’s not.
short.es: Crea enlaces cortos, códigos QR, con tu propio dominio. Compártelos en cualquier lugar. Rastrea lo que funciona y lo que no.
short.ja: 独自のドメインで短縮リンク、QRコードを作成します。どこでも共有できます。何がうまくいっているか、何がうまくいっていないかを追跡します。
short.pt_PT: Crie links curtos, QRCodes, com seu próprio domínio. Compartilhe-os em qualquer lugar. Acompanhe o que está funcionando e o que não…
short.vi: Tạo liên kết ngắn, mã QR với miền riêng của bạn. Chia sẻ chúng ở bất cứ đâu. Theo dõi những gì đang hoạt động và những gì không.
short.zh_CN: 使用你自己的域名创建短链接和二维码。在任何地方分享它们。跟踪哪些有效，哪些无效。
short.zh_TW: 使用你自己的域名創建短連結、QR碼。隨處分享。追蹤哪些有效，哪些無效。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline Your Link Sharing with Our URL Shortener!

Instant Short Link Creation
• Transform long, complex URLs into brief, manageable links with a single click
• Automatically copy new short links to your clipboard for immediate use
• Support for a wide range of domain types and structures

Custom URL Slugs
• Create memorable, branded short links by customizing the URL ending
• Choose alphanumeric combinations that reflect your content or brand
• Easily manage and edit your custom slugs through an intuitive interface

UTM Parameter Customization
• Seamlessly add UTM parameters to your links for enhanced tracking
• Customize source, medium, campaign, term, and content fields
• Save and reuse UTM parameter sets for consistent campaign tracking

QR Code Generation
• Instantly create QR codes for any shortened link
• Download QR codes in various formats(PNG, SVG, JPG)

Whether you're a digital marketer tracking campaigns, a social media manager sharing content, or a professional looking to streamline communication, our extension provides the tools you need to manage and optimize your links effectively.
